argument.name: RTF_Text
argument.description: ASCII encoded RTF text with default font, style, and size attributes.

page.description: Convert from plain text to rtf.
page.discussion: The *PLAIN_TO_RTF() function converts plain ASCII text into encoded RTF text.
page.example: dim rtf_text as C dim plain_text as C plain_text = "George lived on top of a mountain." rtf_text = *plain_to_rtf(plain_text) ? r = "{\rtf1\ansi \deff0{\colortbl;\red0\green0\blue0;}{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil Tahoma;}}{{\f0 \cf1 \fs16 George lived on top of a mountain.}}}"
